FinanceType.name: GNI: Gross National Income
FinanceType.category-description: Non resource flow items requested on DAC table 1

FinanceType.name: Standard grant
FinanceType.description: Grants are transfers in cash or in kind for which no legal debt is incurred by the recipient.

FinanceType.name: Guarantees/insurance
FinanceType.category-name: GUARANTEES AND OTHER UNFUNDED CONTINGENT LIABILITIES

FinanceType.name: ODA % GNI
FinanceType.category-description: Non resource flow items requested on DAC table 1

FinanceType.name: Interest subsidy
FinanceType.description: A payment to soften the terms of private export credits, or loans or credits by the banking sector.

FinanceType.name: Interest subsidy to national private exporters
Total Flows % GNI
FinanceType.category-description: Non resource flow items requested on DAC table 1

FinanceType.name: Capital subscription on deposit basis
FinanceType.description: Payments to multilateral agencies in the form of notes and similar instruments, unconditionally encashable at sight by the recipient institutions.

FinanceType.name: Capital subscription on encashment basis
FinanceType.description: Payments to multilateral agencies in the form of notes and similar instruments, unconditionally encashable at sight by the recipient institutions.

FinanceType.name: Population
FinanceType.category-description: Non resource flow items requested on DAC table 1

FinanceType.name: Aid loan excluding debt reorganisation
FinanceType.category-description: Transfers in cash or in kind for which the recipient incurs legal debt.

FinanceType.name: Investment-related loan to developing countries
FinanceType.category-description: Transfers in cash or in kind for which the recipient incurs legal debt.

FinanceType.name: Loan in a joint venture with the recipient
FinanceType.category-description: Transfers in cash or in kind for which the recipient incurs legal debt.

FinanceType.name: Loan to national private investor
FinanceType.category-description: Transfers in cash or in kind for which the recipient incurs legal debt.

FinanceType.name: Loan to national private exporter
FinanceType.category-description: Transfers in cash or in kind for which the recipient incurs legal debt.

FinanceType.name: Standard loan
FinanceType.description: Transfers in cash or in kind for which the recipient incurs legal debt (and the resulting claim is not intended to be traded). Since payment obligations on standard loan are senior obligations, i.e. creditors are entitled to receive payments against their claims before anyone else, they are also referred to as senior loans.

FinanceType.name: Reimbursable grant
FinanceType.description: A contribution provided to a recipient institution for investment purposes, with the expectation of long-term reflows at conditions specified in the financing agreement. The provider assumes the risk of total or partial failure of the investment; it can also decide if and when to reclaim its investment.

FinanceType.name: Bonds
FinanceType.description: Fixed-interest debt instruments, issued by governments, public utilities, banks or companies, tradable in financial markets.

FinanceType.name: Asset-backed securities
FinanceType.description: Securities whose value and income payments are derived from and backed by a specific pool of underlying assets.

FinanceType.name: Subordinated loan
FinanceType.description: A loan that, in the event of default, will only be repaid after all senior obligations have been satisfied. In compensation for the increased risk, mezzanine debt holders require a higher return for their investment than secured or more senior lenders.

FinanceType.name: Preferred equity
FinanceType.description: Equity that, in the event of default, will be repaid after all senior obligations and subordinated loans have been satisfied; and will be paid before common equity holders. It is a more expensive source of finance than senior debt, a less expensive source than equity.

FinanceType.name: Non-banks non-guaranteed portions of guaranteed export credits
FinanceType.category-description: Transfers in cash or in kind for which the recipient incurs legal debt.

FinanceType.name: Bank export credits
FinanceType.category-description: Transfers in cash or in kind for which the recipient incurs legal debt.

FinanceType.name: Common equity
FinanceType.description: A share in the ownership of a corporation that gives the owner claims on the residual value of the corporation after creditors’ claims have been met.
FinanceType.category-name: EQUITY AND SHARES IN COLLECTIVE INVESTMENT VEHICLES

FinanceType.name: Acquisition of equity not part of joint venture in developing countries
FinanceType.category-name: EQUITY AND SHARES IN COLLECTIVE INVESTMENT VEHICLES

FinanceType.name: Other acquisition of equity
FinanceType.category-name: EQUITY AND SHARES IN COLLECTIVE INVESTMENT VEHICLES

FinanceType.name: Shares in collective investment vehicles
FinanceType.description: Collective undertakings through which investors pool funds for investment in financial or nonfinancial assets or both. These vehicles issue shares (if a corporate structure is used) or units (if a trust structure is used).
FinanceType.category-name: EQUITY AND SHARES IN COLLECTIVE INVESTMENT VEHICLES

FinanceType.name: Reinvested earnings
FinanceType.description: This item is only applicable to Foreign Direct Investment (FDI). Reinvested earnings on FDI consist of the retained earnings of a direct foreign investment enterprise which are treated as if they were distributed and remitted to foreign direct investors in proportion to their ownership of the equity of the enterprise and then reinvested by them in the enterprise.
FinanceType.category-name: EQUITY AND SHARES IN COLLECTIVE INVESTMENT VEHICLES

FinanceType.name: Foreign direct investment, new capital outflow (includes reinvested earnings if separate identification not available)
FinanceType.category-description: Investment made by a private entity resident in a reporting country to acquire or add to a lasting interest(1) in an enterprise in a country on the DAC List of ODA Recipients.

FinanceType.name: Other foreign direct investment, including reinvested earnings
FinanceType.category-description: Investment made by a private entity resident in a reporting country to acquire or add to a lasting interest(1) in an enterprise in a country on the DAC List of ODA Recipients.

FinanceType.name: Foreign direct investment, reinvested earnings
FinanceType.category-description: Investment made by a private entity resident in a reporting country to acquire or add to a lasting interest(1) in an enterprise in a country on the DAC List of ODA Recipients.
